price: (181) And among those We created is a community[426] which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
